body: What was the first map you played on avicus.  Describe what it was like and how nooby you probably were. (not necessarily saying you were)
body_tagged: What was the first map you played on avicus.  Describe what it was like and how nooby you probably were. (not necessarily saying you were)
title: First Map

replies.body: I can't remember... It was over 2 years ago :P
replies.body_tagged: I can't remember... It was over 2 years ago :P

replies.body: This was way back when they had survival games, (when it was called MCzone) and it was sg4. They had the first, second,third,and4th original SG maps.
replies.body_tagged: This was way back when they had survival games, (when it was called MCzone) and it was sg4. They had the first, second,third,and4th original SG maps.

replies.body: Ternio was the first map I played, and I didn't even know how to bridge back then :P
replies.body_tagged: Ternio was the first map I played, and I didn't even know how to bridge back then :P

replies.body: I remember all I used to play was walls, and then when I died I went to the hub and clicked nebula and I saw that nebula had so many more people on it so I joined Quintus, told my brother and we have been playing nebula since then lol
replies.body_tagged: I remember all I used to play was walls, and then when I died I went to the hub and clicked nebula and I saw that nebula had so many more people on it so I joined Quintus, told my brother and we have been playing nebula since then lol

replies.body: I'm about 90% sure it was Quintus.
replies.body_tagged: I'm about 90% sure it was Quintus.

replies.body: I'm pretty sure it was Quintis.. It gave me such an overwhelmed, amazing feeling o3o
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure it was Quintis.. It gave me such an overwhelmed, amazing feeling o3o

replies.body: First map I played was over a year ago back in mczone, and it was Rendezvous I. Only problem was,  I had no idea what I was meant to do. ...
replies.body_tagged: First map I played was over a year ago back in mczone, and it was Rendezvous I. Only problem was,  I had no idea what I was meant to do. ...

replies.body: Luar. I was such a noob on my first day.
replies.body_tagged: Luar. I was such a noob on my first day.

replies.body: My first map on nebula was on senex or frostbite. On frostbite the spawn was riddled with anvils so I couldn't do anything, and on senex I had no idea what was going on. I saw a bunch of skybridges, so I skybridged up and sniped enemies trying to get iron. Oh yeah, it was back in McZone.
replies.body_tagged: My first map on nebula was on senex or frostbite. On frostbite the spawn was riddled with anvils so I couldn't do anything, and on senex I had no idea what was going on. I saw a bunch of skybridges, so I skybridged up and sniped enemies trying to get iron. Oh yeah, it was back in McZone.

replies.body: I'm pretty sure i remember Senex I being my first map back in January? anyways I remember thinking it was REALLY awesome how you could build everywhere and use bows and arrows :)
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure i remember Senex I being my first map back in January? anyways I remember thinking it was REALLY awesome how you could build everywhere and use bows and arrows :)

replies.body:
But my first map ever, i can't remember, it was on walls...
Back last December :)
replies.body_tagged:
But my first map ever, i can't remember, it was on walls...
Back last December :)

replies.body:
Yeah, I had the same feelings
I was freakin the hell out and building everywhere along with making archer towers and sniping the whole game xD
